TryGetDeviceExtension<T>(Instance, Device, out T)

Attempts to load the given device extension.

Declaration
public bool TryGetDeviceExtension<T>(Instance instance, Device device, out T ext)

    where T : NativeExtension<Vk>
Parameters
Type Name Description
Instance instance

The instance to load the extension from.
Device device

The device to load the extension from.
T ext

The loaded device extension, or null if load failed.
Returns
Type Description
System.Boolean

Whether the extension is available and loaded.
Type Parameters
Name Description
T

The device extension to load.
Remarks

This function doesn't check that the extension is enabled - you will get an error later on if you attempt to call an extension function from an extension that isn't loaded.
